scenes.description: Hololive English -Advent- performs their group song 'Connect the World' on stage.
The members of Advent thank the audience and begin revealing their 3D commemorative merchandise.

subtitles.original: Just when we're running out of stop, straight to the top, that's right!
subtitles.english: Just when we're running out of stop, straight to the top, that's right!

subtitles.original: We're ready to seize the game,
subtitles.english: We're ready to seize the game,

subtitles.original: a shimmering showcase,
subtitles.english: a shimmering showcase,

subtitles.original: creating a new phrase where we can shine.
subtitles.english: creating a new phrase where we can shine.

subtitles.original: Day by day,
subtitles.english: Day by day,

subtitles.original: our colorful stories will intertwine.
subtitles.english: our colorful stories will intertwine.

subtitles.original: Get ready to cross the ways,
subtitles.english: Get ready to cross the ways,

subtitles.original: we're voyaging forward,
subtitles.english: we're voyaging forward,

subtitles.original: with courage to run toward the brand new stage.
subtitles.english: with courage to run toward the brand new stage.

subtitles.original: Let's go live,
subtitles.english: Let's go live,

subtitles.original: bridging the distance across the sea,
subtitles.english: bridging the distance across the sea,

subtitles.original: endlessly, follow me,
subtitles.english: endlessly, follow me,

subtitles.original: and we'll turn the page.
subtitles.english: and we'll turn the page.

subtitles.original: Breaking through the doubt,
subtitles.english: Breaking through the doubt,

subtitles.original: we know we'll figure out
subtitles.english: we know we'll figure out

subtitles.original: a way to clear each towering trial.
subtitles.english: a way to clear each towering trial.

subtitles.original: Sharing all our hope,
subtitles.english: Sharing all our hope,

subtitles.original: we can conquer any challenge with a smile.
subtitles.english: we can conquer any challenge with a smile.

subtitles.original: We'll link our hearts
subtitles.english: We'll link our hearts

subtitles.original: as we start to cross the globe.
subtitles.english: as we start to cross the globe.

subtitles.original: Knowing
subtitles.english: Knowing

subtitles.original: no matter where we are,
subtitles.english: no matter where we are,

subtitles.original: no matter how far,
subtitles.english: no matter how far,

subtitles.original: we can be stars, let's go!
subtitles.english: we can be stars, let's go!

subtitles.original: I want to chase the wish unwaveringly,
subtitles.english: I want to chase the wish unwaveringly,

subtitles.original: writing out a brand new story.
subtitles.english: writing out a brand new story.

subtitles.original: Share the future that we can see,
subtitles.english: Share the future that we can see,

subtitles.original: making them reality.
subtitles.english: making them reality.

subtitles.original: Take my hand and reach for the screen,
subtitles.english: Take my hand and reach for the screen,

subtitles.original: all we need are glittering dreams.
subtitles.english: all we need are glittering dreams.

subtitles.original: Our hearts and souls
subtitles.english: Our hearts and souls

subtitles.original: are fulfilled in the world we build.
subtitles.english: are fulfilled in the world we build.

subtitles.original: We're ready to seize the day,
subtitles.english: We're ready to seize the day,

subtitles.original: traversing the path with the shimmering highways
subtitles.english: traversing the path with the shimmering highways

subtitles.original: through everywhere.
subtitles.english: through everywhere.

subtitles.original: Step by step,
subtitles.english: Step by step,

subtitles.original: gathering stories that we can share.
subtitles.english: gathering stories that we can share.

subtitles.original: Get ready to lead the way,
subtitles.english: Get ready to lead the way,

subtitles.original: with each generation,
subtitles.english: with each generation,

subtitles.original: a shining sensation, a dream afar.
subtitles.english: a shining sensation, a dream afar.

subtitles.original: Let's make fans,
subtitles.english: Let's make fans,

subtitles.original: making a moment of history,
subtitles.english: making a moment of history,

subtitles.original: joyfully, follow me,
subtitles.english: joyfully, follow me,

subtitles.original: we'll connect the world.
subtitles.english: we'll connect the world.

subtitles.original: They'll hear our song ringing out
subtitles.english: They'll hear our song ringing out

subtitles.original: over hills and oceans,
subtitles.english: over hills and oceans,

subtitles.original: our legend grows and continues.
subtitles.english: our legend grows and continues.

subtitles.original: We'll carry on, starting now,
subtitles.english: We'll carry on, starting now,

subtitles.original: setting hearts in motion,
subtitles.english: setting hearts in motion,

subtitles.original: connecting all of the world.
subtitles.english: connecting all of the world.

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: Thank you so much to everyone here today!
subtitles.english: Thank you so much to everyone here today!

subtitles.original: How have you liked our 3D showcase
subtitles.english: How have you liked our 3D showcase

subtitles.original: with #Advent3D? Let's see your comments!
subtitles.english: with #Advent3D? Let's see your comments!

subtitles.original: And we had a lot of challenges
subtitles.english: And we had a lot of challenges

subtitles.original: and so much fun performing live to everyone, right?
subtitles.english: and so much fun performing live to everyone, right?

subtitles.original: Thanks to all of you, it was a really exciting 3D showcase!
subtitles.english: Thanks to all of you, it was a really exciting 3D showcase!

subtitles.original: And we can't wait to see you all
subtitles.english: And we can't wait to see you all

subtitles.original: in 3D for future concerts and events!
subtitles.english: in 3D for future concerts and events!

subtitles.original: We hope that you'll continue to watch
subtitles.english: We hope that you'll continue to watch

subtitles.original: Advent really closely and help us here on our journey!
subtitles.english: Advent really closely and help us here on our journey!

subtitles.original: But, but...
subtitles.english: But, but...

subtitles.original: Oh?
subtitles.english: Oh?

subtitles.original: Last but not least, we have some merch to reveal, don't we, Advent?
subtitles.english: Last but not least, we have some merch to reveal, don't we, Advent?

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: So, why don't we go and take our first look, huh?
subtitles.english: So, why don't we go and take our first look, huh?

subtitles.original: Oh, I wonder what it is?
subtitles.english: Oh, I wonder what it is?

subtitles.original: Yeah, what could it be?
subtitles.english: Yeah, what could it be?

subtitles.original: Tada!
subtitles.english: Tada!

subtitles.original: Shiori Novella Matching Belt
subtitles.english: Shiori Novella Matching Belt

subtitles.original: It's the belt! That's right guys!
subtitles.english: It's the belt! That's right guys!

subtitles.original: If you ever want something for your pants
subtitles.english: If you ever want something for your pants

subtitles.original: or other things that I can't talk about, boy, you can have a Shiori-ish belt!
subtitles.english: or other things that I can't talk about, boy, you can have a Shiori-ish belt!

subtitles.original: Yes, so super cool!
subtitles.english: Yes, so super cool!

subtitles.original: What's next?
subtitles.english: What's next?

subtitles.original: It's room slippers! Finally, you can have your own candy feet!
subtitles.english: It's room slippers! Finally, you can have your own candy feet!

subtitles.original: Koseki Bijou Room Slippers
subtitles.english: Koseki Bijou Room Slippers

subtitles.original: Just like me, the pebbles!
subtitles.english: Just like me, the pebbles!

subtitles.original: Aren't they beautiful?
subtitles.english: Aren't they beautiful?

subtitles.original: So pretty, I want my own pair!
subtitles.english: So pretty, I want my own pair!

subtitles.original: Yeah! They'll be comfortable!
subtitles.english: Yeah! They'll be comfortable!

subtitles.original: Do they make that 'clink' sound when you walk?
subtitles.english: Do they make that 'clink' sound when you walk?

subtitles.original: Right! You'll have to get it to find out!
subtitles.english: Right! You'll have to get it to find out!

subtitles.original: Get multiple so you can lick one and use one!
subtitles.english: Get multiple so you can lick one and use one!

subtitles.original: What? Like a lollipop!
subtitles.english: What? Like a lollipop!

subtitles.original: Okay, Shiori, let's see what's next! Here we go!
subtitles.english: Okay, Shiori, let's see what's next! Here we go!

subtitles.original: Nerissa Ravencroft Paper Knife
subtitles.english: Nerissa Ravencroft Paper Knife

subtitles.original: And next is going to be the Nerissa Ravencroft paper cutter knife!
subtitles.english: And next is going to be the Nerissa Ravencroft paper cutter knife!
